Translations.Text: (Katonda) naagamba nti mazima okusaba kwa mmwe mwembiriri kukkiriziddwa, mubeere beesimbu mwembi era temugoberera mwembi ekkubo ly'abo abatamanyi (abatategeera bukakafu bwa ndagaano za Katonda)

Netusomosa abaana ba Israil ennyanja olwo ne Firawo n'abawondera n'amagyege mu ngeri ey'obulabe nâ€™obulumbaganyi, okutuusa lwe yatuukibwako okuzikirira mu mazzi olwo naagamba nti: nzikirizza nti mazima ddala tewali Katonda asinzibwa mu butuufu okugyako oyo abaana ba Israil gwe bakkiriza era nze ndi mu basiramuse
(Firawo naagambibwa nti kati olwo okkiriza) so nga wajeema dda n'obeera mu boonoonyi

Kale nno olwa leero tujja kukuwonya (kukuuma) omulambogwo (guleme kuvunda) olyoke obeere eky'okulabirako eri abalijja oluvanyumalwo, mazima abantu abasinga obungi tebafaayo (kwegasa na bubonero bwaffe)

Mazima twasenza abaana ba Israil mu kifo e kirungi ekyesiimisa netubagabirira mu bigabwa ebirungi, nebataba na njawukana (mu ddiini) okutuusa okumanya lwe kwabajjira (nti Nabbi Muhammad ajja kujja nga mubaka wa Katonda) mazima Katonda agenda kulamula wakati wa bwe ku lunaku lw'enkomerero mu ekyo kye baali baawukanamu

Bwoba nga olimu okubuusabuusa (Ggwe Muhammad) ku ebyo bye twassa gyoli buuza abo abaasoma e kitabo oluberyeberyelwo, ddala amazima gakujjidde okuva ewa Mukama omulabiriziwo kale togeza nga n'obeera mu babuusabuusa
Era ddala tobeeranga mu abo abalimbisa e bigambo bya Katonda n'obeera mu bafaafaganirwa
Mazima abo abaakakatako ekigambo kya Mukama omulabiriziwo tebagenda kukkiriza
Nebwebanajjirwa buli kabonero okutuusa lwe baliraba e bibonerezo ebiruma
